mean_cn: n. 要求（坚决的），需求；  v. 强烈要求，需要
mean_en: to say in a forceful way that something must be done or given to you; to say that you have a right to (something)
word_etyma: de加强 + mand命令 → demand要求
sentence: The bad guy had a demand of one million yuan or he kills the boy.
sentence_trans: 坏人索要100万元人民币，否则他就要撕票。
sentence_phrase: a demand of one million yuan
